com.iplanet.dpro.session

Class ClientSdkSessionRequests

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iplanet.dpro.session.ClientSdkSessionRequests

  • public class ClientSdkSessionRequests
extends Object
    Responsible for performing the Session based logic of sending a request. The remote operations performed by this class are driven around a Request/Response model where the generic Request is assigned values which indicate the type of request being made. The response accordingly is generic and needs to be inspected for the required return values from the request.
